qas.question: How much did Spectre make in its first week?
Which movie previously had the highest earnings for its first seven days?

answers.text: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

qas.question: What movie did Spectre unseat as having the highest earnings for IMAX screenings in the UK?
How much money did Spectre gross on it's opening day in the UK?
What film previously held the UK record for highest first week opening gross?

answers.text: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

qas.question: Spectre passed which movie to become the highest grossing IMAX release in the UK?
Spectre passed which movie to have the largest per screen opening average?
The film grossed $6.4 million from its Tuesday screenings in what country?
In the film's first eight days it grossed how much?
The film's Friday-Sunday gross was how much?
Skyfall's Friday-Sunday gross was how much?

context: In the <b7_0>United Kingdom<b7_0/>, the film grossed £4.1 million ($6.4 million) from its Monday preview screenings. It grossed £6.3 million (<a3_0>$9.2 million<a3_0/>) on its opening day and then £5.7 million ($8.8 million) on Wednesday, setting UK records for both days. In the film's first seven days it grossed <a0_0>£41.7 million ($<b8_0>63.8 million<b8_0/>)<a0_0/>, breaking the UK record for highest first-week opening, set by <a1_0><a4_0>Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban<a4_0/><a1_0/>'s £23.88 million ($36.9 million) in 2004. Its Friday–Saturday gross was £20.4 million ($<b9_0>31.2 million<b9_0/>) compared to Skyfall's £20.1 million ($<b10_0>31 million<b10_0/>). The film also broke the record for the best per-screen opening average with $110,000, a record previously held by <a6_0>The Dark Knight<a6_0/> with $100,200. It has grossed a total of $136.3 million there. In the U.K., it surpassed <a2_0><a5_0>Avatar<a5_0/><a2_0/> to become the country's highest-grossing IMAX release ever with $10.09 million.
